document.heading: Criminalization of Non-Consensual Pornography Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-275, the “Criminalization of Non-Consensual Pornography Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-903. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2014, and December 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 19, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-534 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-275 became effective May 7, 2015.
